name: A lost Voyager
description:
While exploring the galaxy, The Voyager's Spaceship crashed on a planet far from home. Its forest glows like fire which resonates with his desires. He walks on the fiery grasses in search of hope, Only to find that he does not walk alone. 

Activate the Beacons in a sequence and escape the wilderness.

Controls :

I - Interact

WASD - Move

Thank You for playing the game
